news_header: The European Investment Bank announced a €900 million aid package for Spain following deadly flooding.
news_text: On Wednesday, the European Investment Bank reported a €900 million financial aid package to Spain to assist with rebuilding after severe flooding in the Valencia region that resulted in at least 217 deaths. The bank is open to providing more support if requested by Spanish authorities. Additionally, Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez announced €10.6 billion in aid for flood victims.
